title: Wave 14: Arena Mode
description: Major release introducing Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison with hidden identities and voting system, plus Plan Mode for smarter task planning with detailed implementation plans before coding.

community_feedback.quote: Arenas suck, here's why we just added one to Windsurf
Arena Mode in Windsurf: One prompt. Two models. Your vote

title: CLI v0.93.0: SOCKS5 Proxy and Plan Mode Enhancement
description: Added optional SOCKS5 proxy listener with policy enforcement, enhanced Plan mode to stream proposed plans in user-friendly format. Updated from v0.92.0 to v0.93.0.

title: GPT-5-Codex-Mini Model and Web Search Default
description: New GPT-5-Codex-Mini model introduced as a smaller option. Web search now enabled by default for local tasks in both Codex CLI and IDE Extension.

title: Cognizant Partnership for Enterprise Scale
description: Cognition (creator of Devin AI) announced strategic partnership with Cognizant to scale autonomous software engineering across enterprise operations.

community_feedback.quote: Infosys just partnered with Cognition to deploy Devin... creating ripples in the industry

title: Agent Skills v0.26.0
description: Major release v0.26.0 introduces Agent Skills enabled by default with skill-creator built-in skill, new Hooks system, enhanced UI/UX, and improved security features.

title: Waydev Integration for AI Adoption Tracking
description: Waydev added Devin AI support to their engineering analytics platform, enabling teams to track AI adoption and usage alongside tools like Claude, Copilot, Cursor, and Windsurf.

title: What's New Notification and Model Usage Guidance
description: CLI v0.89.0 introduces notification box showing new version on first run after update, and adds model usage guidance within the CLI interface.

title: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Version 2.4 introduces Subagents for parallel task execution with specialized context, Skills system for domain-specific workflows, and built-in image generation capabilities using Google Nano Banana Pro model.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor now uses subagents to complete parts of a task in parallel. Subagents lead to faster overall execution and better context usage
Subagents lead to faster overall execution and better context usage. They also let agents work on longer-running tasks
Coding agents subsume the bulk of workflow automation software. Long-running agents reliably complete multi-week software tasks

title: VS Code Copilot Parallel Subagent Execution
description: VS Code Copilot update introduces parallel subagent execution for improved performance, new skills system for specialized tasks, and deeper Claude integration with extended features.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code usually gets multiple updates every week

title: Copilot CLI Enhanced Agents and Context Management
description: GitHub Copilot CLI update brings enhanced agents with improved capabilities, better context management for more relevant suggestions, and new installation methods for easier setup.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Support
description: Added support for GPT-5.2-Codex with four reasoning efforts (low, medium, high, and xhigh). OpenAI's latest model designed for agentic coding, excelling at working in large codebases over long sessions.

title: Agent Skills for Cascade
description: Windsurf now supports Agent Skills for Cascade, enabling agents to discover and apply domain-specific knowledge and workflows when relevant.

title: CLI Major Update: Plan and Ask Modes
description: Cursor CLI enhanced with new Plan mode for approach design and Ask mode for code exploration. Features cloud handoff for background tasks, one-click MCP authentication, and word-level inline diffs.

title: Claude Code 2.1 Released
description: Major update with 16 new changes including LSP tool for code intelligence (go-to-definition, find references, hover documentation), terminal setup improvements, and automatic context clearing when accepting plans.

community_feedback.quote: Largest update in history with 1,096 commits
Shift from chatty coding assistant to an agent orchestration framework
Does anyone have an idea why Claude code is suddenly... slow response times
Claude Code CLI was broken due to CHANGELOG.md format changes
Hot reload skills, session teleportation, wildcard permissions
Claude commands were renamed to Claude skills, need to migrate custom commands
